sentences.en: A print of a woodcut , lithograph, or other engraved material, especially when reproduced in a book.
sentences.cn: 铅版:木刻, 平版或其它雕刻材料的印模, 尤指在书中复制时的印版.

sentences.en: A print of woodcut, lithograph, or other engraved material, especially when reproduced in a book.
sentences.cn: 准备用作印刷表面的一片金属, 塑料,橡胶, 纸板或其它材料, 例如电版或铅版.

sentences.en: Door - Goods ( left and right ) , Traditional Taohuawu Woodcut Woodcut New Year Picture, SuZhou.
sentences.cn: 苏州传统桃花坞木刻年画《门神 ( 左右)》.

sentences.en: Huang Kai's comic - panel color woodcut prints depict playing with his friends as a child.
sentences.cn: 黄恺连环画风格的套色木刻描绘着幼时伙伴间的嬉戏.

sentences.en: In the history of the Chinese Reborn Woodcut Movement are still many deserved to be investigated.
sentences.cn: 在新兴木刻运动历史中,有许多问题值得进一步深入研究.

sentences.en: It's a woodcut image from Blast.
sentences.cn: 这是《暴风》中的一幅木雕版画。

sentences.en: Luxun had deep love for artistic works all his life, especially in woodcut of block print.
sentences.cn: 鲁迅先生一生热爱美术作品, 对版画中木刻兴趣尤甚.

sentences.en: Texture, which is the important language form in woodcut creation, is always valued by artists.
sentences.cn: 肌理作为版画创作中重要的语言形式, 历来被艺术家们所重视.

sentences.en: The most common form of relief printing is woodcut.
sentences.cn: 最常见的凸版印刷形式是木刻印版.

sentences.en: The playing - cards were printed by woodcut blocks, and many specimens survive.
sentences.cn: 纸牌是用雕版印刷, 有许多样本保存了下来.

sentences.en: The woodcut "Autumn" was conceived as a harvest scene.
sentences.cn: 木刻《秋》是按丰收的景象来构思的。

sentences.en: The woodcut reproduced below circulated in print in the 1520 s.
sentences.cn: 下图重现的是16世纪20年代流通的木版画.

sentences.en: This is an image called "Rotterdam" by the artist Edward Wadsworth. It's a woodcut image from Blast.
sentences.cn: 这里有张图片，是出自艺术家爱德华•华兹华斯的《鹿特丹》，是《爆炸》杂志中的一幅木刻图片。

words.tran_cn: 樵夫；划木者；木版雕刻师

trans.tran_en: a picture made by pressing a shaped piece of wood and a colouring substance onto paper
